verses.name: Matthew 26:55
verses.text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes, Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple, and ye laid no hold on me.

verses.name: Matthew 26:56
verses.text: But all this was done, that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled. Then all the disciples forsook him, and fled.

verses.name: Matthew 26:57
verses.text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest, where the scribes and the elders were assembled.
